title: Alessandro
text:
I am a Ph.D. student in Annalisa Bracco’s group at the Georgia Institute of Technology.
My research focuses on using manifold learning and deep learning to better understand and represent the dynamics of the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC).
In the past, I also worked on advancing the understanding of tropical-to-extratropical atmospheric circulation.

title: Alessandro
text:
Education
Before starting my Ph.D., I worked for one year at the ICTP as a junior researcher.
I obtained my M.Sc. in Physics at the University of Trieste, and my B.Sc. in Physics at La Sapienza University of Rome.
